subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: Reliever George Sherrill and the Baltimore Orioles agreed to terms on a one-year, $2.75 million contract Saturday, avoiding arbitration. Sherrill made the American League All-Star team in 2008, going 3-5 with a 4.73 earned run average and 31 saves. He threw two and a third scoreless innings in the All-Star Game at Yankee Stadium. He had sought $3.4 million after earning $1 million last season.
